---

Roman numerals - given in not nessecarily the minimal form preferred.

Read in input (and load library)

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
input <- readLines("noter/0089_roman.txt")
```


Convert to numeric via `as.roman`. Convert back to roman. Calculate the saved characters, and summarise to get the answer:

```{r eval = FALSE}
tibble(input = input) |> 
  mutate(numeric = as.numeric(as.roman(input)), 
        roman = as.roman(numeric),
        saved = nchar(input) - nchar(as.character(roman))) |> 
  summarise(answer = sum(saved))
```
